_language.errorAlreadyRegistered:

_language.errorWrongFormat:
🚫 ERROR 🚫 *Incorrect format*

📝 Correct usage: *${usedPrefix + command} nombre.edad*
 [ 💡 ] Example : *${usedPrefix + command}* ${name2}.18
